Articles.Content:
I would love to have the ability to place colony parts on interstellar ships, either the ability to place a limited selection of colony parts, or any. I feel like this would make the creation of huge, cool looking ships a lot easier. If this were to be implemented, I’d assume you could only do this from a space port but who knows, it’s kerbal. 
 

         If this has already been confirmed or discussed, I haven’t heard so I’ve made this.

From what I know, the same systems used to build stuff on orbital construction docks (most certainly confirmed) can be put on interstellar ships, which will basically be giant stations with giant engines.
